commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I can't believe the performance is tomorrow at last! Our costumes are all ready, and the stage is all set.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: And we've worked out the singing and dancing nicely, too, which is a relief.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'm baaaack!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Welcome back, you three. Did you ask everyone for us?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yup! Dia's going to play the king!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ooh! That means she's gonna be our dad!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I asked Kanata to be the queen!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: *Giggle* So our Sleeping Beauty will be a queen instead of a princess.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I asked Nico to take part too...as the role of the pet dog.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh my... What an adorable pet we'll have. She didn't say she'd prefer to play a human?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: She was all excited and said that this was a role only Nico-Ni could play. *Giggle* She's so simple-minded.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Everyone will greet the audience after the show. Not as school idols, but as subjects of the royal kingdom.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I wonder what kind of greeting it will be? *Giggle* This is going to be so fun!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That'll be when we decide who among us is the loveliest princess.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Even though we're three very different types of princesses, soon people will have to choose just one.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: About that, actually... I've been thinking that since we were all able to embody a different princess image, maybe everyone should get a gold medal.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's true... I don't think it'll be important to focus on who got it right or who's the best.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, you're right! In that case, I wanna live in a castle with you two, Riko and Karin!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah. We don't really need to compete anymore.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Don't forget that you each have one of us as your prince, too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We will back you up as much as we possibly can until the performance is over!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We'll handle the rest from here, so how about you princesses head home early and take it easy?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: C'mon, don't worry about it! You're our most precious princesses, so leave it to your princes!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All right then... I suppose we'll take you at your word.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Maki, You, Setsuna, thank you all so much! We're counting on you tomorrow, too!

commands.speaker: Maki, You, Setsuna
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Did you manage to sleep well last night?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I did, since I was able to get home early. Thanks so much!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't believe how amazing it's been to have our princes supporting us.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: *Giggle* And you can keep relying on us from here on out!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Let us handle all the backstage work. You just have as much fun as you want out there on stage.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Honoka? What's wrong?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, I'm just...thinking about how happy I am.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's like we were able to create this world for us to live in because everyone helped us out so much.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Now I feel like I can pull off wearing a princess dress with pride.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Honoka, you're going to be the best princess in the whole world! I guarantee it!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Thank you! I feel like I can become a real princess, even if it's just for today.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's really as if I met a new self and a new family just getting ready for this performance.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's all thanks to you, Honoka. Let's show everyone in the audience the world that we dreamed up!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I know we three sisters can do it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All right, it's time for us to get ready. Let's go!

commands.speaker: Honoka, Riko
commands.line: Yeah!
